title: Thiel International Oligarchic Network Operations (2010-2025)
description: Map Thiel's global business relationships and ideological connections paralleling Putin's oligarchic model for systematic influence
source_document: The Capture Cascade - Part 4: The Bridge.pdf
research_notes: Generated from systematic analysis of Silicon Valley networks as transmission belts for oligarchic capture. Focus on specific dates, financial transactions, personnel movements, and institutional coordination mechanisms.
research_areas: International investments in 33 countries creating global network operating independently of diplomatic channels
Cryptocurrency ventures creating international influence operation opportunities while avoiding financial monitoring
Academic and think tank networks funded globally promoting anti-democratic ideologies
Intellectual cover provision for oligarchic governance models through international institutional funding
